backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no backend logic required for mainnet deployment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file documenting navigation updates, content updates, and related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated summaries describing key frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Checklist covering frontend asset canister build and verification steps for mainnet deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions including light/dark variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes detailing the v1.0.0 mainnet deployment, features, routes, and configuration changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing theme support and TanStack router integration.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandButto: Brand-styled button wrapper offering primary, secondary, and accent variants.
Logo component rendering the brand image with fallback to text when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renderer for structured content blocks including headings, lists, emphasis blocks, and link lists.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info and navigation sections for solutions, industries, and company links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the main header with navigation, dropdown logic, mobile menu, and solutions mega menu integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and scroll-sync provider around routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Solutions: Displays a two-column mega menu for solutions with category previews and dynamic service lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Defines the homepage hero section with background image, headline, and CTA buttons.
Stores developer reference links to Google Docs containing manual content sources for pages and services.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for structured page content, blocks, sections, and link items.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Registers structured page content for solutions and categories, including text blocks and service link lists.
frontend/src/content/solutionServicePage: Defines detailed PageContent objects for solution service pages, including titles, sections, and structured text blocks.
frontend/src/content/solutionServices.ts: Provides a registry of all solution service definitions with pageIds, titles, routes, and category associations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity, refetching related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDropdownHoverRegio: Tracks pointer position to determine if a dropdown’s trigger or panel is hovered, triggering close when outside the region.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity state, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Updates the document title with brand-aware formatting and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future backend query utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSolutionsActiveCat: Observes solution category sections and determines the active one based on intersection ratios with hysteresis to reduce flicker.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders dynamic content pages with themed styling and banner handling, including fallback logic on image errors.
frontend/src/pages/CustomDomainPage.tsx: Provides instructions and UI for setting up a custom domain, including DNS details and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing hero content and a grid of AV solution categories with links to detailed pages.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with an illustration and a button to return home.
Landing page for all solution categories with hero banner, scroll-synced sections, and links to services.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router config, including root layout, solutions and industry pages, and dynamic service routes.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Exports brand constants like name, domain, logo, and contact info for consistent site-wide use.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Defines color themes for industry pages and provides a helper to retrieve a theme by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation structure and a helper that flattens nested navigation items into a full route list.
frontend/src/site/pageBannerResolver.ts: Resolves banner images for pages using filename conventions with fallback to predefined mappings.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Maps page IDs to their banner image paths and alt text for hero images across solutions and industries.
frontend/src/site/pageThemes.ts: Provides theme selection logic for solutions and industry pages based on predefined color schemes.
frontend/src/solutions/solutionsScrollSy: Implements React context to track and reset the active solutions category for scroll-sync behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS, extending colors, fonts, animations, and layout settings for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project state for updating a website’s industry navigation and replacing content for ten industry pages. Includes schema info, architectural notes, and a list of existing features to implement or maintain.
